date: "8 May 2018"
output: html_document

This app allows users to select different wine properties and predict the quality of the wine.

The model was trained using a random forest prediction model using the caret package and the red wine dataset obtained from the UC Machine Learning Repository obtained from the following url: <https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/wine+quality>


The code is also available at <http>
